amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that $2 million of the EPA Hazardous Substance Superfund account will made available to fund the National Hazardous Waste and Superfund Ombudsman.

action.text: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Bilirakis. (consideration: CR H4841-4843; text: CR H4841
By unanimous consent, the Bilirakis amendment was withdrawn.
